transcript.title: RADIO-ACTIVE IODINE IN MILK
transcript.content:
1/ 3
T,, IA IA~~. Press-Statement No. 131
September 1973
RADIO-ACTIVE IODINE IN MILK
The Prime Minister announced today that
the low levels of radio-active iodine which had
earlier been observed in Perth's milk supply were
no longer detectable. of the nine major milk
supplies included in the Government's monitoring
program, Perth's was the only one in which
radio-active iodine had been detected.
CANBERRA. A. C. T.
